title: What the Pennsylvania Media Is Saying About the Senate Debate
description: The halting performance of Lt. Gov. John Fetterman, a Democrat who had a stroke in May, dominated coverage of his debate with Dr. Mehmet Oz in their pivotal race.
dc:creator: Neil Vigdor

media:content.media:credit: Tom Gralish/The Philadelphia Inquirer, via Associated Press
media:content.media:description: Television reporters outside the debate venue in Harrisburg, Pa., on Tuesday.
